flawed_nl_solution:
Ned has gone up 165 / 11 = <<165/11=15.0>>15.0 flights of stairs.
Thus, he has 20 - 15.0 = <<20-15.0=5.0>>5.0 flights of stairs left to run up.
He will spend 5.0 * 11 = <<5.0*11=55.0>>55.0 seconds running up the remaining stairs to the bomb.
Therefore, he will have 72 - 55.0 = <<72-55.0=15.0>>15.0 seconds to defuse the bomb.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17.0, not 15.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
